name: PAY4
tag_list: sepa-direct-debit, online-bank-transfer, qooqo, direct-debit, sofort, giropay, online-money-transfer
overview:
PAY4 is an Alternative Payment Transaction Provider, located in Frakfurt/Main, Germany (Headquarter) and Montreal, Canada.

PAY4 is specialized on the technical realisation of alternative payment methods in the internet and enables global eMerchants to offer their european and international customers the preferred payment methods.

PAY4 offers it’s clients the transactional completion of all relevant payment methods in Europe „from a single source“, such as the various national direct debits, SEPA direct debit, eWallets like skrill and PayPal as well as online-money transfer in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Belgium, The Netherlands, Italy, Poland and Great Britain. With qooqo PAY4 now also offers it’s clients a mobile payment system based on smartphone-apps that is perfectly suited to globally distribute intangible goods to their international mobile consumers.

Due to it’s PCI-certification PAY4 can guarantee full compliance with all regulatory demands on the data security.
